hu.szabot.transloadit

Class TransloaditRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.szabot.transloadit.TransloaditRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IApiRequest<TransloaditResponse>

    public class TransloaditRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements IApiRequest<TransloaditResponse>
    Uses Transloadit services based on the current configuration
